name: smartcheck
description: Make sure gulp and gulp-taypescript from npm are available. Then run the gulpfile in this directory.

scripts.release: (npm test) && (git pull origin master && npm version patch && git push origin master && git checkout release && git merge master && git push origin release && git checkout master)
scripts.startdev: (git checkout master && git pull origin master)
